headline: Tapestry, Inc. to Host Investor Day on September 10, 2025
summary: NEW YORK, July 02, 2025--Tapestry, Inc. (NYSE: TPR), a house of iconic accessories and lifestyle brands, will host an Investor Day on Wednesday, September 10, 2025 in New York City. The event will highlight Tapestry’s long-term strategic growth initiatives and financial outlook, featuring a series of presentations as well as a question and answer session with members of the Company’s senior leadership team, including Joanne Crevoiserat, Chief Executive Officer, and Scott Roe, Chief Financial Off
